See TextAutoSizeSample for an example of a custom text auto size implementation. (I85756)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Moved the DetectTapGesturesEnableNewDispatchingBehavior feature flag to ComposeFoundationFlags and renamed it to isDetectTapGesturesImmediateCoroutineDispatchEnabled. The old flag is deprecated and will now delegate to ComposeFoundationFlags.isDetectTapGesturesImmediateCoroutineDispatchEnabled instead. (I62932)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Bug Fixes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Enabled DetectTapGesturesEnableNewDispatchingBehavior by default. TapGestureDetector APIs now use the new dispatching behavior (immediate dispatch) by default. (I9f2bc, b/369648479)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Fixed the requiredWidth/Height/Size modifiers to properly handle intrinsic sizes. (Ie3d7d, b/368113212)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["External Contribution"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Commonized BasicTooltip in foundation and BasicTooltip/Tooltip in material3. (Ifc2e6)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Added a new Clipboard interface and a composition local for it. (I80809)"]}]},{"tag":"hr","attrs":null,"children":[]},{"tag":"a","attrs":{"href":"https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/compose-material#1.8.0-alpha08"},"children":[{"tag":"h3","attrs":null,"children":["Compose Material 1.8.0-alpha08"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Bug Fixes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Adds displayCutout to the group of insets that Material components take into account by default, to avoid content overlapping with the display cutout.

This is a behavior change that will impact how inset-aware components behave around a display cutout. This includes the default value of the WindowInsets parameter for inset-aware Material 3 components, and the WindowInsets values provided in the component.
Defaults objects for both Material 2 and Material 3. If this change causes undesirable behavior, manually specify the WindowInsets parameter on a per-component basis. (I43ee9, b/362508045)
"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["The activity that is used as the host for the composable under test when using ComposeContentTestRule.setContent now uses the theme Theme.Material.Light.NoActionBar, to avoid the ActionBar from overlapping with test content when targeting SDK 35. To opt out of this behavior, you can remove the dependency on ui-test-manifest and add an activity entry in your test app's AndroidManifest.xml for ComponentActivity with the theme of your choice. (I7ae1b, b/383368165)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["External Contribution"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Expose sheetGesturesEnabled in ModalBottomSheetLayout. (I3f032, b/329543529)"]}]},{"tag":"hr","attrs":null,"children":[]},{"tag":"a","attrs":{"href":"https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/compose-material3#1.4.0-alpha06"},"children":[{"tag":"h3","attrs":null,"children":["Compose Material 3 1.4.0-alpha06"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Behavior Change"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Added displayCutout to the group of insets that Material components take into account by default, to avoid content overlapping with the display cutout. This is a behavior change that will impact how inset-aware components behave around a display cutout. This includes the default value of the WindowInsets parameter for inset-aware Material 3 components, and the WindowInsets values provided in the component Defaults objects for both Material 2 and Material 3. If this change causes undesirable behavior, manually specify the WindowInsets parameter on a per-component basis. (I43ee9, b/362508045)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["API Changes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Updates to the TopAppBar API. Rename the medium and large top app bars with a subtitle to *FlexibleTopAppBar. Unified the color variations into a single TopAppBarDefault.topAppBarColors() function, and added a subtitle color parameter to be applied for a provided subtitle Composable (I41b65)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Remove WideNavigationRailArrangement API in favor of Arrangement.Vertical (Id0341)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Add a new VerticalSlider @Composable. (I2bfba)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Add a new Track @Composable that allows specifying custom external track corners and track icons. (I436a4)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Update the floating toolbar APIs to use the FloatingToolbarColors object instead of a single container color. (I9a054)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Add and use new experimental annotation ExperimentalMaterial3ComponentOverrideApi (Ia1eaf)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Modifier.indicatorLine now takes a shape for the text field to handle clipping. (I8c5f3, b/380704151)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Rename the experimental FloatingAppBar functions to FloatingToolbar (I1dbf8)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Added a new floatingToolbarVerticalNestedScroll that can be attached to a scrollable container to update the floating toolbar expansion state based on a scroll motion that crosses a threshold. (I6d65f)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Introducing a new API for creating a floating toolbar with an attached Floating Action Button (FAB). The API provides flexible customization options, allowing you to arrange the toolbar horizontally or vertically and place the FAB at the start or end of the toolbar. (I9e350)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Bug Fixes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Fix a Snackbar accessibility issue that caused it to announce itself on dismiss when TalkBack is on. (/I9db53)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["External Contribution"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Commonized BasicTooltip in foundation and BasicTooltip/Tooltip in material3. (Id45aa)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Hide ThreePaneScaffoldHorizontalOrder.toLtrOrder. (I6f8d2)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["ThreePaneScaffoldPredictiveBackHandler has been made public. (I1a995, b/370543873)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Added isPredictiveBackInProgress property to ThreePaneScaffoldState. (I1a995, b/370543873)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Create overriding mechanism for AnimatedPane to support sideloading implementations for different form factors. (Id7622)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Bug Fixes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Fix the issue when the settling direction has no anchors. (df8257d)"]}]},{"tag":"hr","attrs":null,"children":[]},{"tag":"a","attrs":{"href":"https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/compose-runtime#1.8.0-alpha08"},"children":[{"tag":"h3","attrs":null,"children":["Compose Runtime 1.8.0-alpha08"]}]},{"tag":"hr","attrs":null,"children":[]},{"tag":"a","attrs":{"href":"https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/compose-ui#1.8.0-alpha08"},"children":[{"tag":"h3","attrs":null,"children":["Compose UI 1.8.0-alpha08"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["API Changes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Making AutofillManager an abstract class. (I0a3b0)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Fixed several focus-related issues, including crashes when IME tries to focus on ComposeView without focusable items, focus change within child AndroidViews, and focus request leaving an AndroidView. (Ia03c3, b/369256395, b/378570682, b/376142752)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Change FocusEnterExitScope.cancelFocus() to cancelFocusChange() (I89959)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["You may now calculate Composable occlusions with RectInfo.calculateOcclusions()."]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Added extension function on DelegatableNode to register a listener for global layout changes. (I68b59)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Bug Fixes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["The activity that is used as the host for the composable under test when using ComposeContentTestRule.setContent now uses the theme Theme.Material.Light.NoActionBar, to avoid the ActionBar from overlapping with test content when targeting SDK 35. To opt out of this behavior, you can remove the dependency on ui-test-manifest and add an activity entry in your test app's AndroidManifest.xml for ComponentActivity with the theme of your choice. (I7ae1b, b/383368165)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Resource fonts with the same variation settings will now avoid over-caching causing the incorrect variation settings to be applied. (If3dff, b/372044241)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["AnnotatedString.fromHtml now supports <ul>/<li> tags. (I7c2fe, b/299662276, b/139326648)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["External Contribution"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Added a new Clipboard interface and a composition local for it. (I80809)"]}]},{"tag":"hr","attrs":null,"children":[]},{"tag":"a","attrs":{"href":"https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/wear-compose#1.5.0-alpha08"},"children":[{"tag":"h3","attrs":null,"children":["Wear Compose 1.5.0-alpha08"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["API Changes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have updated all Wear Compose libraries to ‘explicit API’ mode. (Iebf9f)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have made the pager’s snap animation parameter part of PagerDefaults. (Ifff64)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have added an offset parameter was to SwipeToDismissBoxState. (I586bd)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Bug Fixes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Rotary platform haptics are now called for Wear OS versions after V (Idb03e)"]}]},{"tag":"hr","attrs":null,"children":[]},{"tag":"a","attrs":{"href":"https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/wear-compose#1.0.0-alpha31"},"children":[{"tag":"h3","attrs":null,"children":["Wear Compose 1.0.0-alpha31"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["API Changes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have updated all Wear Compose libraries to ‘explicit API’ mode. (Iebf9f)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have updated the ScreenScaffold and EdgeButton APIs, so that it is easier to specify content paddings on screens that include an EdgeButton. In the new API the EdgeButton's size is only passed to the EdgeButton, and the ScreenScaffold takes an edgeButtonSpacing parameter for the spacing between EdgeButton and list content. (I424fd)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["In DatePicker, we have renamed parameters minDate to maxDate, and  minValidDate to maxValidDate. In DatePickerColors, we have renamed parameter selectedPickerContentColor to  activePickerContentColor, and unselectedPickerContentColor to inactivePickerContentColor (Iba17b)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have updated the ArcProgressIndicator defaults to strokeWidth=6dp and recommended diameter = 81.24% of screen height (I6f248)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have updated the Confirmation API to reflect its usage as a dialog. The composable is now called ConfirmationDialog, with associated updates to the naming of colors and defaults classes. We have also renamed the show parameter to visible for compatibility with other Compose animation APIs. In addition, we have made ConfirmationDialogContent, SuccessConfirmationDialogContent, FailureConfirmationDialogContent available for situations where developers need to customize the intro/outro dialog animations. (Iaeb33)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have updated CircularProgressIndicatorContent to CircularProgressIndicatorStatic (the non-animated variation of CircularProgressIndicator) so that it can now be used to build CircularProgressIndicator with custom animations. (I1346f)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have fixed the parameter ordering on the ArcProgressIndicator, putting the modifier parameter first (I4656a)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Improved the SwipeToReveal API to receive a text slot parameter for the labels of the actions (except secondary action) and to remove label parameters from undo action (I5b3db)"]}]},{"tag":"h4","attrs":null,"children":["Bug Fixes"]},{"tag":"ul","attrs":null,"children":[{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have fixed a bug where LongPress haptics were triggered more than once in Button, Card, IconButton, TextButton (Ia8b0f)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Changes to the UX of AlertDialog - on large screens the  confirm and dismiss buttons are now smaller. There is also increased spacing below the confirm and dismiss buttons. (I4f066)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have changed the animation specs of the action button label of the SwipeToReveal component. (Ib87fb)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Changed SwipeToReveal to expand the container at the same time that the text is displayed. (I44cf8)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Improved SwipeToReveal to perform haptic feedback when the swipe passes the threshold where the primary action is committed. (I23efe)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have updated SwipeToReveal to display ellipsis on text overflow by default, for primary and undo actions. (I71f5a)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have fixed an issue causing jitter on ButtonGroup animations. (I63f8f)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have added text semantics to AnimatedText (I6063c)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Dialog now resets background scaling when the dialog is removed from the composition (without this fix, the launching screen may have been left in a scaled down state) (Id24ac)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["We have added a shape morph animation to the buttons in the Stepper component (Id6ed3)"]}]}]}
